nodes.text: Praknat 3 was a small, uninhabited moon, the closest of those which orbited the planet Trymant IV. During an Emergence of the Great Hyperspace Disaster in the Trymant system, a fragment of the Legacy Run's main hull struck Praknat 3, misaligning the gravitational balance of the entire star system. Trymant IV was tilted closer to the system's second sun as a result, causing an environmental catastrophe as all of its aboveground water sources were vapourized.
